price: Na sikutakini juu yake ujira, kwani ujira wangu hauko ila kwa Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
arabic: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Na wala sitaki kwenu ujira kwa ajili ya ninayo kupeni ya nasaha na wito. Na sina malipo ila kwa Mwenye kuwaumba viumbe wote, Aliye miliki mambo yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin in ajriya illā ʿalā rabbi al-ʿālamīna
